name: Dais of Dice
description:
Dais of Dice is first of all a stupid name, but no other synonym of platform that I could find rhymed with dice as well so here we are.

It's also a puzzle platformer where you play as a die, and each time you jump it rolls to a different side which affects what tiles in the level you can interact with.

The controls are explained in the game, with the small additions that:

  •  holding down space let's you jump higher and 
  •  you can pause the game by pressing escape.

The game does not have audio.
